Reviews.Title: “Value price, good location”
Reviews.Author: Steve V
Reviews.Content: clean 108 offstrip location traveling town easier dont expect 200 night amenities unacceptable paintings museum tv wasnt flat screen channel selection shower wasnt tall people thats design flaw quality issue bed comfortable pillows dont understand negative reviews bad week staff picky people found staff friendly helpful housekeeping paid little attention detail major

Reviews.Content: booked motel resort marketing service dark lights checked bed bedding lot wear stained comforters looked makeup mattresses worn pillows flat wednesday morning showered shower snow whites entourage 7 dwarfs ready day loaded stuff staying night gone day afternoon evening returned final night garbage removed liner bathroom light fan couldnt tell cleaned hand towels wash cloths bath towels front desk told towels bath towels seen barely dry self stay walk run fast

Reviews.Content: decided check day sunday due weather forcast front desk sunday husband phone outside told leave keys name hotel able receipt due available 800 am breakfast stopped afterwards found office locked credit card bill discovered charged days called inn informed manager call following day needless call receptionist cordial issue trying money looks contact credit card company settle dispute

Reviews.Title: “Don't leave anything behind and expect to get it back when you return.”

Reviews.Content: people nice ok left checked realizing left 2 bottles unopened wine drawer returned hour missing maid cleaned idea office contact maid touch called sent letter received response leave expect cleaning people claim own management doesnt care branson 34 times wont hotel
